channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.title: Leveraging Linear Decryption: Rate-1 Fully-Homomorphic Encryption and Time-Lock Puzzles
item.description: Zvika Brakerski and Nico Döttling and Sanjam Garg and Giulio Malavolta
